ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Plane of Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: Very nicely put!  Agree 100% To each their own.  We all pay to play so we all have the right to play however we want within the RULES of the game.  If it aint
ygData.messageBody:
Very nicely put! Agree 100%

To each their own. We all pay to play so we all have the right to play
however we want within the RULES of the game. If it aint against the rules
then nobody has a right to tell you your way of playing is wrong, whichever
way that might be.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath since Beta 2
----- Original Message -----
From: "Big Daddy Legba" <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, August 28, 2000 2:17 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Plane of Fear


> It all lies in what you want out of the game. Unfortunatly in your (and
I'm
> sure lots of people's, since I hear this all the time) veiw, what others
> players have/do affect your enjoyment. (And I don't mean directly as in
> training half a dungeon on your head, but rather indirectly in that you
want
> to feel price in your accomplishments and feel your accomplisments are
> lessened when others achieve them.)
>
> Other people have different veiws (in this case they just wish to have the
> items/experience of being on the planes/whatever).
>
> The unfortunate part is their veiw conflicts with yours (and again, I dont
> mean to point at YOU but rather you as a group who share similar veiws).
> Theres not much that can be done about this, as both groups of people have
> the right to play the game. You (and your comrades) know how you got your
> planar gear, let that be enough.
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
>
